code: import{useCallback}from'react';export var useMessage=function useMessage(){return useCallback(function(message){if(window.M&&message&&message!=="null"){if(message.message){toast(message.message);}else if(typeof message!=="string"){message.forEach(function(msg){toast(msg);});}else{toast(message);}}},[]);};var toast=function toast(text){window.M.toast({html:text});};
